video.title: Last Man Standing
video.synopsis: After his wife's career takes off, Mike finds himself in charge of parenting their three daughters and trying to stay afloat in all the estrogen.

episodes.synopsis: Mike plays Cupid for Mandy by setting her up on a date with Kyle, one of his employees. But Mike's set-up gets off track when Kyle meets Kristin.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa has second thoughts about baby-proofing the house when she is left alone to babysit and can't release the toilet seat's complicated latch.
episodes.title: Last Baby Proofing Standing

episodes.synopsis: When Vanessa forces Mike to attend Grandparents Day at their grandson Boyd's preschool, Mike manages to insult the teacher and get Boyd kicked out.
episodes.title: Grandparents Day

episodes.synopsis: Let down when his daughters don't want to celebrate Halloween with him, Mike turns to 2-year-old Boyd to be his trick-or-treat partner.
episodes.title: Last Halloween Standing

episodes.synopsis: Mike must decide which way he will vote when the all-male Outdoor Man's softball team gets a mandate to allow females to play.
episodes.title: Co-ed Softball

episodes.synopsis: When Mandy wants to enter a modeling contest on TV, Vanessa insists that Mike play the bad cop this time -- but he has difficulty following through.
episodes.title: Good Cop, Bad Cop

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa rallies the neighbors to start a Neighborhood Watch program. While Mike patrols the block, he gets wrapped up in some neighborhood gossip.
episodes.title: Home Security

episodes.synopsis: After an innocent date with Kristin, Kyle accidentally falls asleep in her bedroom. When Mike discovers this, he establishes a new set of house rules.
episodes.title: House Rules

episodes.synopsis: Though Mike is thrown when he meets his new neighbors, a lesbian couple, he's impressed with the similar interests he shares with one of the women.
episodes.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner

episodes.synopsis: Mike's Christmas spirit gets dampened when Ryan, the father of Kristen's baby, unexpectedly comes back to town after a long absence.
episodes.title: Last Christmas Standing

episodes.synopsis: Amazed that Mandy has found a passion for something, Mike takes her under his wing when she campaigns to keep Ed's favorite hangout from closing.
episodes.title: The Passion of the Mandy

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa wonders if Mike feels tied down now that he spends more time at home. Kristin and Eve think Mandy's choice to become a vegan is only a phase.
episodes.title: Moon Over Kenya

episodes.synopsis: Mike is taken aback when he finds out that Ed -- an absentee dad -- has hired his own daughter as the new marketing consultant of Outdoor Man.
episodes.title: Take Your Daughter to Work

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa blames Mike for their lack of party invitations, so he attempts to be friendlier and agrees to attend a neighbor's dinner party.
episodes.title: Odd Couple Out

episodes.synopsis: When Vanessa gives Mike a history of their house for his birthday, they discover that a woman who once lived there over 100 years ago died upstairs.
episodes.title: House of Spirits

episodes.synopsis: When Mandy gets the chance to meet her idol, Kim Kardashian, things don't go as planned, but the outcome is better than she could have ever imagined.
episodes.title: Tree of Strife

episodes.synopsis: When Mike gets a NASCAR champ and his race car to jazz up the Outdoor Man retail space, Mike realizes how much he misses his adventures on the road.
episodes.title: Adrenaline

episodes.synopsis: Mike's father and brother arrive in town and want to bid on constructing a new Outdoor Man store, reigniting a sibling rivalry between the brothers.
episodes.title: Baxter & Sons

episodes.synopsis: When Mike catches a teen prankster, the kid injures himself. Now his litigious father expects Mike to pay the doctor bill.
episodes.title: Ding Dong Ditch

episodes.synopsis: When Mandy's new boyfriend, Terrence, turns out to be an animal rights activist, he clashes with Mike, who collects guns and hunts for sport.
episodes.title: Animal Wrongs

episodes.synopsis: Mike and Ed have second thoughts after inviting non-athletic Kyle to join their team for Outdoor Man's annual sports competition.
episodes.title: Wherefore Art Thou, Mike Baxter

episodes.synopsis: When Mike's dad, Bud, moves to town to build the new Outdoor Man store, Vanessa is concerned that Bud's ways might elevate Mike's high blood pressure.
episodes.title: This Bud's for You

episodes.synopsis: After Mike unintentionally upstages Vanessa's important announcement, his efforts to make it up to her cause more harm than good.
episodes.title: The Spotlight

episodes.synopsis: When Vanessa's sweet but flighty sister comes to visit, Mike knows she's only coming to ask for another loan. Meanwhile, Kristen and Kyle break up.
episodes.title: Found Money

episodes.synopsis: Mike tries to persuade first-time voter Mandy to vote for Governor Romney. But Kristin disapproves of Mike's attempt to influence Mandy.
episodes.title: Voting

episodes.synopsis: When Boyd gets in trouble for playing dodgeball, which has been banned at school, Mike says today's parents are raising a generation of wimps.
episodes.title: Dodgeball Club

episodes.synopsis: When their African American neighbors' car is egged, Vanessa goes against Mike's advice and tells them that their car wasn't the only one vandalized.
episodes.title: High Expectations

episodes.synopsis: Mike is shocked to learn Vanessa sided with Ed's ex-wife, Wanda, after their divorce. Ed tells Mike he thinks he and Wanda should get back together.
episodes.title: Ed's Twice Ex-Wife

episodes.synopsis: After Vanessa's presentation to Eve's class on career day about her work for an oil company, the class accuses Vanessa of destroying Mother Earth.
episodes.title: Mother Fracker

episodes.synopsis: After Mike brings home a duck he shot for dinner, Boyd stops eating meat. Mike explains the circle of life to his grandson, with surprising results.
episodes.title: Circle of Life

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa longs for a quiet, no-fuss Christmas. Not knowing what to get Vanessa for Christmas, Mike decides a family-free holiday is the perfect gift.
episodes.title: Putting a Hit On Christmas

episodes.synopsis: When Eve is suspended from school for calling a boy a bad name, Mike is surprised that name-calling would be considered bullying.
episodes.title: Bullying

episodes.synopsis: Bill has been Outdoor Man's architect for years, so he's dumbfounded when Mike tells him the job may now go to a young, gorgeous female architect.
episodes.title: Attractive Architect

episodes.synopsis: When Mike concedes to hire a housekeeper, the topic of immigration comes up, and Ed is asked to check the green cards of the Outdoor Man staff.
episodes.title: The Help

episodes.synopsis: When Mike hangs his prized U.S. flag in the yard, 14-year-old Eve is inspired by her dad's patriotism and announces she wants to join the Junior ROTC.
episodes.title: Mike's Pole

episodes.synopsis: Mike is so impressed with Greg, Mandy's new boyfriend and the high school star quarterback, that he offers him a job at the Outdoor Man.
episodes.title: Quarterback Boyfriend

episodes.synopsis: When Mike finds out his grandson is no longer registered at school as a Baxter, Kristen tells him Ryan wants their son to start using his last name.
episodes.title: What's in a Name?

episodes.synopsis: To celebrate the Buffalo Bill Day Sale-abration, the Outdoor Man puts on a skit based on a Wild West Show, directed by Mike and starring Ed and Eve.
episodes.title: Buffalo Bill Day

episodes.synopsis: When Mike catches Mandy sneaking into the house late one night after being with Kyle, he wages psychological warfare on the couple.
episodes.title: Breaking Curfew

episodes.synopsis: Mike hires a private soccer coach for Eve to help her chances of getting a scholarship. But all the Baxter ladies become enamored with the young man.
episodes.title: Private Coach

episodes.synopsis: Mike is surprisingly impressed with Ryan when they take Boyd to a baseball game and have a run-in with a tipsy Bill McKendree.
episodes.title: The Fight

episodes.synopsis: When the less-than-studious Mandy gets accepted to not one but two colleges, Kristin realizes it's time to reevaluate where she is in her life.
episodes.title: College Girl

episodes.synopsis: Mike doesn't want Boyd to go to a bilingual school, so he offers to have Boyd stay there part of the time for him to go to a different school.
episodes.title: Back to School

episodes.synopsis: Mike thinks Vanessa and Eve aren't spending enough time together, so he has Vanessa give Eve driving lessons.
episodes.title: Driving Lessons

episodes.synopsis: When Vanessa tells Mandy she should join a sorority at school, Mandy ends up spending much less time with Kyle and may move on from him.
episodes.title: Pledging

episodes.synopsis: Ryan's on strike from his job driving a beer truck and gets into a tense confrontation with Kristin's boss, which makes Kristin upset.
episodes.title: Ryan V. John Baker

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa designs the haunted house for Halloween at Boyd's school and ends up scaring Boyd with her ideas, which Mike thinks is OK.
episodes.title: Haunted House

episodes.synopsis: Mike is accused of stealing Carol Larabee's school board campaign signs off his lawn, but he eventually realizes that he agrees with her policy ideas.
episodes.title: Larabee for School Board

episodes.synopsis: Eve has a snow-shoveling business but starts losing clients to a neighbor who uses a snow blower. It turns out the man has recently lost his job.
episodes.title: Shoveling Snow

episodes.synopsis: Feeling bad for Kyle, Vanessa helps him get a job as a boat salesman at Outdoor Man, but he's terrible at his new gig.
episodes.title: Vanessa Fixes Kyle

episodes.synopsis: Bud comes to town and asks for Mike's help in opening a marijuana store. Boyd makes a video about why his relatives are thankful.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Bud admits to spanking Boyd, and Kristin expresses resentment to Vanessa over being spanked as a kid. Kyle hates a hat Mandy bought for him.
episodes.title: Spanking

episodes.synopsis: Mike and Vanessa want Boyd to celebrate a traditional Christmas, while Kyle wants Boyd to be exposed to different customs from around the world.
episodes.title: Elfie

episodes.synopsis: Eve becomes the target of ridicule from her classmates when she shares one of her father's conservative video blogs on social media.
episodes.title: All About Eve

episodes.synopsis: Mike, Vanessa and Ryan all think Boyd is too young for ADHD medication, so Mike builds a hockey rink in the backyard for Boyd to release his energy.
episodes.title: Breaking Boyd

episodes.synopsis: Boyd's school, which is named after explorer William Clark, could be renamed after Boyd and Ryan collaborate on a report about Clark owning slaves.
episodes.title: Renaming Boyd's School

episodes.synopsis: Mike gives Vanessa a taser and flowers for Valentine's Day, but the flowers are unmarked and Kristin thinks they came from her boss.
episodes.title: Taser

episodes.synopsis: The Baxters' dog, Muffin, impregnates the Larabees' dog. In the ensuing negotiation over financial responsibility, Mike learns Chuck has moved out.
episodes.title: Stud Muffin

episodes.synopsis: Mike becomes wary of Eve's boyfriend, Justin, even though Eve tells Vanessa that Justin is religious and has taken a vow of purity.
episodes.title: Eve's Boyfriend

episodes.synopsis: Mandy upsets Mike and Vanessa when she drops out of school to start her own fashion line, but Mike realizes that she's running her business well.
episodes.title: Project Mandy

episodes.synopsis: Eve tries to get out of a difficult geometry class so she can keep her grades impressive enough to get accepted to West Point.
episodes.title: Hard-Ass Teacher

episodes.synopsis: When Bud's marijuana store gets robbed, Mike wants to get him a gun but Bud resists. Mike feels left out when the other guys tell war stories.
episodes.title: Parenting Bud

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa's sister wants to have a child and asks Mike and Vanessa to pay for her to get a donor egg. But then Mandy offers one of her own eggs.
episodes.title: April Come She Will

episodes.synopsis: Kristin protests when Mike wants Boyd to participate in a rodeo event. Eve's boyfriend wants her to wear a dress to the prom, not her ROTC uniform.
episodes.title: Mutton Busting
